content:
Which of the following is the correct punctuation for the sentence given the context that it is part of a larger question in a formal email seeking clarification on the location of a lost pet and the sender is trying to convey a sense of urgency and distress? 
Have you seen my dog? 
A) Have you seen my dog 
B) Have you seen my dog. 
C) Have you seen my dog! 
D) Have you seen my dog...

In the context of a formal email seeking clarification on the location of a lost pet, where the sender is trying to convey a sense of urgency and distress, option C) "Have you seen my dog!" would be the most appropriate punctuation. The exclamation mark emphasizes the urgency and distress the sender is feeling about the situation.
